abstract: Tom Morello, of Rage Against the Machine and The Nightwatchman, has always written protest music. It is his aesthetic, his raison d'etre his trademark.
snippet: Tom Morello, of Rage Against the Machine and The Nightwatchman, has always written protest music. It is his aesthetic, his raison d'etre his trademark.

headline.main: Q. and A.: Tom Morello Offers 'a Record of Rousing Hopelessness'
